ResearchProjectDef.label: Rucksacks
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to start crafting general purpose ruck sacks and research how to make rucksacks specialized for battlefield medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combat Pouches
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to start crafting special purpose pouches for things like grenades and is a necessary step towards understanding battlefield medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Battlefield Medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft individual first aid kits, rucksacks for medics, and the trauma packs to load them with.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sidearm Holsters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft holsters for side-arms, including the shoulder holster and research how to make tactical slings for carrying long guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tactical Weapon Slings
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft tactical slings for carrying long guns.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sheathes & Scabbards
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft sheaths for knives and scabbards for swords.
